name: Parkour 3D Ultra 2
description:
The second installment of Parkour 3D! I'm an aged 13 dev and I create all sorts of games. Feel free to reccomend a idea for me to make a game! You need a pretty decent computer to play this game:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Parkour 3D recommened:

2GHZ Quad core or better

GTX 780 or better

8GB RAM

Parkour 3D Ultra recommended:

3.2GHZ Quad core or better

GTX 960 or better

8GB RAM

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PHOTO SENSITIVITY WARNING!!!

Also some of the screenshots I wanted to upload exceed maximum size so please download the game to see the rest of the screenshots!

This game is optimized, so don't say its running slow, it's your computer. Deal with it. I get 60fps+ with GTX 970, i5@3.2GHZ and 8GB RAM
